content:
Is the example validator in the spec missing some?
http://hl7.org/fhir/2018May/medicationadministration0306.xml.html
Has an empty performer/function value

(and medicationadministration03079)
But that's all folks.
Round tripping all the examples apart from the couple I've listed here now works with the R4 .net parsers/serializers.
I'll try and get those fixed today, but I'm flying so not sure how good my internet will be. Is there a new validation being done? I didn't have an error on the last build.
these are errors that we're picking up downstream of the build. I haven't yet investigated why the build hasn't picked them up

@Melva Peters, these are being picked up by the .net validation/parsers which have a different implementation, so other "eyes" going over them. I wish I had time to have done this prior to the ballot prep closing.
